articles.title: China's Nio teams up with Geely on auto battery swapping
articles.description:
(marketscreener.com) Chinese automakers Nio
and Zhejiang Geely Holding Group said on Wednesday
they had signed a strategic partnership agreement on battery
swapping that would see them work together on standards,
technology and model development.
 The deal ma…
